sourcesContent:
<template>
    <add-form @createOrUpdate="createOrUpdate"></add-form>
</template>
<script>
import AdminAdd from '../components/AdminAdd.vue'
import { api } from '../helpers/Helpers.js'

export default {
    name: "admin-page",
    components: {
        'add-form':AdminAdd
    },
    methods:{
        createOrUpdate(item){
            if(item.id){
                api.put(`/api/cameras/${item.id}`, item)
                .then(() => {
                    this.$router.push({name: 'admin-page'})
                })
            }else{
                api.post('/api/cameras', item)
                .then(() => {
                    this.$router.push({name: 'admin-page'})
                })
            }
        }
    }

}
</script>
<style scoped>
</style>
